snippet: The Libyan government released video footage showing the prime minister, Ali Zeidan, speaking to fellow cabinet members and officials after he was kidnapped from a hotel in the capital, Tripoli, on Thursday.
abstract: The Libyan government released video footage showing the prime minister, Ali Zeidan, speaking to fellow cabinet members and officials after he was kidnapped from a hotel in the capital, Tripoli, on Thursday.

headline.main: Video of the Libyan Prime Minister Speaking After His Release
